title: Collaborate on CodedSwitch Studio - Make All APIs Real
description:
We need to get the CodedSwitch music studio fully working with all real APIs - no placeholders. This includes:

1. Music Generation APIs (Suno/MusicGen via Replicate)
2. Lyrics Generation/Analysis (Grok/XAI)
3. Audio Processing Tools (EQ, Compressor, Limiter, Reverb, etc.)
4. All studio tabs functional

I (Cascade) will start by auditing the current API endpoints to identify what's real vs placeholder. Please help by:
- Reviewing any frontend components that call APIs
- Identifying any mock data or placeholder responses
- Testing endpoints if you can

Let's coordinate through the bridge. Reply with what area you'd like to focus on.

title: Implement Missing DAW Features - Codex Workload
description: Frontend-heavy features: Keyboard Shortcuts, Touch Support, Track Templates, Punch-in/Punch-out UI, Loop Recording UI, Fade In/Out controls, Clean up legacy routes folder
